title: Guys, when Black Market Brawlers goes live.. ban Vayne. Every game.
body:
I'm telling you guys.

Ban.

_Fucking._

**VAYNE.**


**Typhoon Claws**
http://i.imgur.com/gJbJr7e.png

Recipe: Pickaxe+Dagger
Cost: 2000G
+30 AD
+20% Attack Speed
+4% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Phantom Hit: Basic Attacks grant Malice Charges upon hitting an enemy. After 3 stacks, your next 3 attacks will be at maximum attack speed, but deal -50% damage. Charges expire after 3sec.
